description:
Corps is a dead person that lived in a house near Kunoe City. The house got a reputation in the area as being a Scary House because he liked to tell scary stories to his visitors. Corps invites travelers into his house and part of his welcoming services he provides a meal, accommodation and a fluffy towel to dry off.
He likes to entertain his guests with a scary story, but Bonnie didn`t find them too scary. He befriended a Ghos, Ghost and Gangar when he was younger and they have also resided in the house. They are part of Corps welcoming services.
Ash Ketchum and Bonnie found a notebook and a photo in the basement room which indicated that Corps was over 200 years old. Corps responded by telling them that he remembered that it was him in the picture and that he was actually dead. The photo was dated July 14th, 1758.
name: Corps
